original_title: Abans’ LG Smart Inverter Refrigerator awarded highest energy efficiency rating in Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: Abans PLC, the exclusive distributor of LG refrigerators  yesterday announced the recognition of the LG Smart Inverter Refrigerator GL-K272SLBB (258L) as the highest-certified Energy Efficient model in Sri Lanka.

The prestigious 7.3 Rating (L/W) as per Minimum Energy Performance (MEP) labelling was conferred by the Sri Lanka Sustainable Energy Authority and Sri Lanka Standards Institute. This recognition underscores LG’s commitment to developing and manufacturing innovative, energy-efficient refrigerators that not only provide unrivalled performance and convenience but also promote a greener and more sustainable future.

The award recognises the LG Smart Inverter Refrigerator as one of the most energy-efficient models available in Sri Lanka. With its Smart Inverter Technology, the LG Smart Inverter Refrigerator 258L consumes only 24kWH per month, making it an environmentally friendly and electricity saving choice for consumers.

The LG Smart Inverter Refrigerator is equipped with LG’s Smart Inverter Compressor, one of the most advanced and energy-efficient compressors ever developed. Unlike conventional compressors that continuously work at full capacity, the LG Smart Inverter Compressor automatically adjusts its speed to deliver the precise cooling required according to the quantity of food stored inside the refrigerator. This technology offers up to 36% more electricity savings on consumers’ money.

Furthermore, the LG Smart Inverter Refrigerator uses R600a gas with a low Global Warming Potential (GWP) rating of 3, making it an eco-friendly refrigerator that helps protect the ozone layer and reduce electricity consumption. The LG Smart Inverter Refrigerator is also equipped with Hygiene Fresh, eliminating 99.999% of bacteria inside the refrigerator, and comes with a 10-year warranty on the Inverter Compressor.

“At Abans, we are committed to providing consumers with the most advanced and Electricity saving appliances available on the market. The LG Smart Inverter Refrigerator is just one example of how we are making a positive impact on the environment while delivering superior products to our customers,” said Abans PLC Brand Department Deputy General Manager Ruwan Gunasekara.
Abans PLC is proud to offer the LG Smart Inverter Refrigerator and other environmentally friendly refrigerators at its showrooms islandwide and Buyabans.com.
